cd:Attribute.name: long_name

cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: irradiance wavelengths shift fitted values per subwindow

cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: systematic error of the slant column density

cd:Attribute.name: long_name

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: systematic error of vertical column density

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: radiance wavelength shift from the doas fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: root mean square from the doas fit

cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: brominemonoxide_slant_column formaldehyde_slant_column nitrogendioxide_slant_column chlorinedioxide_slant_column o2o2_slant_column ozone_slant_column_223K ozone_slant_column_243K ozone_lambda_slant_column ozone_squared_slant_column ring_fit

cd:Attribute.name: long_name

cd:Attribute.name: index_meaning
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: brominemonoxide_slant_column_precision formaldehyde_slant_column_precision nitrogendioxide_slant_column_precision chlorinedioxide_slant_column_precision o2o2_slant_column_precision ozone_slant_column_223K_precision ozone_slant_column_243K_precision ozone_lambda_slant_column_precision ozone_squared_slant_column_precision ring_fit_precision

cd:Attribute.name: long_name

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Number of spectral points used in the DOAS retrieval

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: no_error solar_eclipse sun_glint_possible descending night geo_boundary_crossing geolocation_error

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The altitude of the satellite with respect to the geodetic sub satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Latitude of the geodetic sub satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Longitude of the geodetic sub satellite point on the WGS84 reference ellipsoid

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Relative offset [0.0, ..., 1.0] of the measurement in the orbit

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar azimuth angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured clockwise from the North (East = 90, South = +/-180, West = -90)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Solar zenith angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Sattellite azimuth angle at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured clockwise from the North (East = 90, South = +/-180, West = -90)

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Zenith angle of the satellite at the ground pixel location on the reference ellipsoid. Angle is measured away from the vertical

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud albedo from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Coregistered cloud albedo based on the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud albedo precision from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Error of the coregistered cloud albedo based on the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: effective radiometric cloud fraction from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Coregistered effective radiometric cloud fraction using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: effective radiometric cloud fraction precision from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Error of the coregistered effective radiometric cloud fraction using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud radiometric optical centroid height from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Coregistered height at the level of cloud w.r.t. the geoid/MSL using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud radiometric optical centroid height precision from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Error of the coregistered height at the level of cloud w.r.t. the geoid/MSL using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Coregistered and converted atmospheric pressure at the level of cloud using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: cloud radiometric optical centroid pressure precision from the CRB model

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Error of the coregistered and converted atmospheric pressure at the level of cloud using the OCRA/ROCINN CRB model.

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Eastward wind from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: Northward wind from ECMWF at 10 meter height level

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The mean of the sub-pixels of the surface altitude above the reference geoid (WGS84) within the approximate field of view, based on the GMTED2010 surface elevation database

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The standard deviation of sub-pixels used in calculating the mean surface altitude above the reference geoid (WGS84) within the approximate field of view, based on the GMTED2010 surface elevation database

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: flag indicating land/water and further surface classifications for the ground pixel

cd:Attribute.name: flag_meanings
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: land, water, some_water, coast, value_covers_majority_of_pixel, water+shallow_ocean, water+shallow_inland_water, water+ocean_coastline-lake_shoreline, water+intermittent_water, water+deep_inland_water, water+continental_shelf_ocean, water+deep_ocean, land+urban_and_built-up_land, land+dryland_cropland_and_pasture, land+irrigated_cropland_and_pasture, land+mixed_dryland-irrigated_cropland_and_pasture, land+cropland-grassland_mosaic, land+cropland-woodland_mosaic, land+grassland, land+shrubland, land+mixed_shrubland-grassland, land+savanna, land+deciduous_broadleaf_forest, land+deciduous_needleleaf_forest, land+evergreen_broadleaf_forest, land+evergreen_needleleaf_forest, land+mixed_forest, land+herbaceous_wetland, land+wooded_wetland, land+barren_or_sparsely_vegetated, land+herbaceous_tundra, land+wooded_tundra, land+mixed_tundra, land+bare_ground_tundra, land+snow_or_ice

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: random error of vertical column density

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices for the pixel corners; index starts a 0 (counter-clockwise, starting from south-western corner of the pixel in ascending part of the orbit).

cd:Attribute.name: long_name
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: offset from reference start time of measurement

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices across track, from west to east; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: A continuous quality descriptor, varying between 0 (no data) and 1 (full quality data). Recommended to ignore data with qa_value < 0.5

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: This coordinate variable defines the indices along track; index starts at 0

cd:Attribute.name: comment
cd:Attribute.cd:FixedValue: The time in this variable corresponds to the time in the time_reference global attribute
